Description: Half length figure of Lord Nelson facing head three-quarter left, empty right sleeve pinned up. (obverse)
Curator's comments: Brown 1980 states: The date 6th October 1798 on this medal is obviously incorrect and is probably an error for 6th November, the date on which he was elevated to the title. See also Brown 1 p106.447. Bibliography: Milford Haven, Admiral the Marquis of. 'British Naval Medals', London, 1919, 479.
Bibliographic references: Brown 1980 / A catalogue of British historical medals 1760-1960, vol.I: the accession of George III to the death of William IV (p109.451)
Associated names: Named in inscription & portrayed: Horatio Nelson, 1st Baron and Viscount Nelson
Associated events: Commemoration of: Battle of the Nile,1798
